entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:10 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 60 this morning and minus 52 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 38. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 41. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
